message: Hi Bob, I have a product I think you might be interested in. It's a unique piece and I'm asking for $15000 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down to $13500 to make this deal work. This reflects the unique value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12500?
